meanings.sent2: The airfreighted cargo was light enough to be transported by plane.
meanings.sent3: The airfreighted gift was so light that it almost floated away!
meanings.sent4: The airfreighted clouds moved swiftly across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The airfreighted birds soared effortlessly through the sky.

meanings.definition: To send or deliver by air transport.
meanings.sent1: They airfreighted the urgent documents to the client.
meanings.sent2: The company airfreighted the perishable goods to the remote island.
meanings.sent3: I airfreighted my love to you on the wings of a plane.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were airfreighted to distant lands every night.
meanings.sent5: The memories of childhood were airfreighted back to her mind.
